column5: doin' the carp thing in brampton tommorow. talked to a guy that says there are carp in professors lake . they might not be huge but they're there. strawberry or orange? any ideas?
OOPs, sorry. Thought this was a hockey thread.
"OOPs, sorry. Thought this was a hockey thread."  HaHa!    Me too!  But I'm gonna say strawberry.   Orange is too much like lemon.
Roy really loves Carp especially when a Musky catches one for dinner!!
Any fruit flavor will work in winter. Make sure you chum a bit. Best flavour that I caught on in the winter is choc. caught a 18lb 3oz last week, not through the ice.  Daniel OCH
